text: وَأَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡكَيۡلَ إِذَا كِلۡتُمۡ وَزِنُواْ بِٱلۡقِسۡطَاسِ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقِيمِۚ ذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ وَأَحۡسَنُ تَأۡوِيلٗا
translation: Give full measure when you measure, and weigh with accurate scales; that is fair and best in the end[33].
footnotes: [33] Fair dealing is best, for it brings blessing, psychological calm, and reward in the Hereafter.
